definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The method can be used for measuring the voltage standing-wave ratio and tuning match of the microwave signal source quickly.
sentences.chinese: 還可快速測量微波源的駐波比和實現對它的匹配。

sentences.english: Indoing sos the standing wave nature of the solution is emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 簡正波具有駐波性質，基本已反映在一階近似解中。

sentences.english: Application: Suitable for railway, VSWR at good performance, RFID system, closed processing, anti-water ability.
sentences.chinese: 駐波比性能好，封閉式處理，防水防腐能力強。

sentences.english: The SWR wattmeter application in short-wave communication system is considered.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了駐波功率表在短波通信中的應用。

sentences.english: A scalar wave tends to propagate as a transverse wave or a standing wave.
sentences.chinese: 分級梯狀波往往是以橫波或駐波傳播。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the method of suppressing the interference of stationary wave.
sentences.chinese: 這裏討論了壓制這種駐波干擾的方法。

sentences.english: Besides, the essay discloses the process of energy transformation between any wave band and the wave belly next to it.
sentences.chinese: 並討論了駐波在相鄰波節與波腹之間能量的轉化過程。

sentences.english: When the heating power of traveling-wave stage increased, the onset temperature decreased at first and then increased.
sentences.chinese: 隨着駐波級加熱功率的增加，起振溫度趨於降低。

sentences.english: In this paper the model of two level atomic momentum spread in amplitude modulated standing light wave was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 分析了二能級原子在振幅調製駐波場中動量擴散模型。

sentences.english: For example, peaks in the measured receive signal correspond to frequencies that create standing waves.
sentences.chinese: 例如，接收信號的最高峯對應的是產生駐波的頻段。

sentences.english: This "channeling" phenomenon is advantageous for atomic deposition in laser SW.
sentences.chinese: 這種現象有利於提高原子在駐波場中聚焦沉積的效果。

sentences.english: It was calculated that standing wave was formed because of the reflection of microwave on the stainless steel wall of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 計算結果表明微波在爐腔內金屬壁上全反射形成駐波。

sentences.english: The reflectionless potential well affected by a standing laser field is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究弱激光駐波場中的無反射勢阱。

sentences.english: There are just standing waves in these waters.
sentences.chinese: 在這些洪水中只有駐波。

sentences.english: Methods Use a standing wave tube to measure the sound absorption coefficient of many kinds of grain.
sentences.chinese: 採用駐波管法測量了多種糧食的吸聲係數。

sentences.english: Low IMD and low VSWR provides improved system performance .
sentences.chinese: 低的互調幹擾和低的電壓駐波比保證了系統的性能。
